name: Corrupted (itch) (36litters)
description:
Overview Video How to play

Press the "Play" button to start the game, it's that simple!

1. Select Character (In the first play, you play as a designated character.)

2. Deploy squadmate and let the battle begin. Battles are automatic!

3. During the battle, use your cards at the right time to achieve victory. 

(Tip: If you use a Hard CC skill on an enemy who is using a skill, the skill will be canceled.)

More Tips
  • So far, only mouse play is supported. In the future, we plan to support card use using the keyboard.
  • For most objects, you can check information by mouseover or right-click.
  • The only languages supported yet are English and Korean.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Our Discord Link: https://discord.gg/3f2GXSqsBM
